ReportSection.name: In-Person Assessment
ReportSection.title: In-Person Assessment: {$user_name}
ReportSection.ReportItem:
1. VISION

Enter snellen eye chart result
{$item}

Follow up?
Note: Score is 6/12 or lower, recommend follow up
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    function checkSubmitted(){
                        if(SubmittedPDF){
                            $("#avoid_vision_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_hearing_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_communication_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_cognition_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_dementia_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_depression_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_balance_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_adl_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_iadl_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_caregiver_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_bowel_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_meds_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_immunization_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_fatigue_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_nutrition_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_osteo_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_pain_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_dental_fup_recommended").show();
                            $("#avoid_lifestyle_fup_recommended").show();
                        }
                        else{
                            $("#avoid_vision_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_hearing_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_communication_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_cognition_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_dementia_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_depression_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_balance_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_adl_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_iadl_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_caregiver_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_bowel_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_meds_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_immunization_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_fatigue_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_nutrition_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_osteo_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_pain_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_dental_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_lifestyle_fup_recommended").hide();
                        }
                    }
                    checkSubmitted();
                    $(document).ready(function(){
                        $("#avoid_vision_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_hearing_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_communication_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_cognition_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_dementia_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_depression_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_balance_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_adl_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_iadl_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_caregiver_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_bowel_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_meds_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_immunization_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_fatigue_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_nutrition_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_osteo_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_pain_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_dental_fup_recommended").hide();
                            $("#avoid_lifestyle_fup_recommended").hide();
                        checkSubmitted();
                    });
                        
                    setInterval(function(){
                        checkSubmitted();
                    }, 100);
                </script>
ReportSection.ReportItem:
2. HEARING

Difficulties in hearing reported?
{$item}

Follow up?
Note: Failed to correctly repeat 3 whispered numbers or self-identified difficulties with hearing, recommend follow up
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#recommend_hearing').hide();
                    function hideHearingRec(){
                        var count = 0;
                        if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper1']:checked").val() == "Fail"){
                            count += 1;
                        }
                        if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper2']:checked").val() == "Fail"){
                            count += 1;
                        }
                        if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper3']:checked").val() == "Fail"){
                            count += 1;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing']").val() == "Yes"){
                            $('span#recommend_hearing').show();
                        }
                        else if(count == 3){
                            $('span#recommend_hearing').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#recommend_hearing').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideHearingRec);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper1']").change(hideHearingRec);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper2']").change(hideHearingRec);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing_whisper3']").change(hideHearingRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_hearing']").change(hideHearingRec);

                </script>

                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_communication2']").val() == "Yes"){

                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_communication3']").val() == "Yes"){

                        }

ReportSection.ReportItem:
5. DEMENTIA QUICK SCREEN

3 Word Recall:
How many words recalled?{$item}
Animal Naming within a Minute: How many animals?{$item}

Follow up?
Note: Recommended, Any positive result calls for further screening
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#recommend_dementia').hide();
                    function hideDementiaRec(){
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia3']").val() == "Mildly Abnormal"){
                            $('span#recommend_dementia').show();
                        }
                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia3']").val() == "Abnormal"){
                            $('span#recommend_dementia').show();
                        }
                        else if(parseInt($("[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia']").val()) < 2){
                            $('span#recommend_dementia').show();
                        }
                        else if(parseInt($("[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia2']").val()) < 15){
                            $('span#recommend_dementia').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#recommend_dementia').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideDementiaRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia3']").change(hideDementiaRec);
                    $("[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia']").change(hideDementiaRec);
                    $("[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dementia2']").change(hideDementiaRec);

                </script>
ReportSection.ReportItem:
6. DEPRESSION

Are you basically satisfied with your life?
{$item}

Do you often get bored?
{$item}

Do you often feel helpless?
{$item}

Do you prefer to stay at home rather than going out and doing new things?
{$item}

Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?
{$item}

Follow up? Note: Recommended, Any positive result calls for further screening
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#avoid_depression_fup_txt').hide();
                    function calculateDepressionScore(){
                        var depression_score = 0;
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression']").val() == "No"){
                            depression_score++;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression2']").val() == "Yes"){
                            depression_score++;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression3']").val() == "Yes"){
                            depression_score++;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression4']").val() == "Yes"){
                            depression_score++;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression5']").val() == "Yes"){
                            depression_score++;
                        }
                        return depression_score
                    }
                    function hideDepressionRec(){
                        if(calculateDepressionScore() >= 2){
                            $('span#recommend_depression').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#recommend_depression').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideDepressionRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression']").change(hideDepressionRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression2']").change(hideDepressionRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression3']").change(hideDepressionRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression4']").change(hideDepressionRec);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_depression5']").change(hideDepressionRec);

                </script>

Do you have any difficulties or need reminding about everyday activities?

{$item}

Do you get constipated?
{$item}

{$item}

{$item}
If yes, how has it changed? {$item}

13. MEDICATIONS

How many prescribed medications do you take daily?
{$item}

How many over the counter medications do you take daily?
{$item}

Any Concerns about regular medication use (missing doses or taking twice by mistake)?
{$item}

14. COMPLAINING OF FATIGUE

Do you feel exhaustion or fatigue during normal activities?
{$item}

If yes, How many days in a week does this occur during normal activities?
{$item} / Week

Follow up? (Recommended if 3-4 times per week)
{$item}

Any unplanned weight loss in the last year?
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    function calcBMI(){
                        var BMI = 0;
                        var height = 0;
                        var weight = $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition1']").val();
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition1_2']").val() == "lbs"){
                            weight = weight * 0.453592;
                        }
                        if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_2']").val() == "feet"){
                            height = $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_1']").val() * 30.48;
                            height = height + $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_2_2']").val() * 2.54;
                        }
                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_2']").val() == "inches"){
                            height = $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_1']").val() * 2.54;
                        }

                        BMI = (weight/height/height) * 10000;
                        BMI = Math.round(BMI * 10) / 10;
                        $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition5']").val(BMI);
                    }
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_2']").change(calcBMI);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition1_2']").change(calcBMI);
                    $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition1']").change(calcBMI);
                    $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_1']").change(calcBMI);
                    $("input[type='text'][name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_nutrition2_2_2']").change(calcBMI);
                </script>

Waist Circumference (cm)

                        }
                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental2']").val() == "No"){
                            $('span#avoid_dental4').show();
                        }
                        else if($("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental3']").val() == "No"){

                        }

                    }

                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental2']").change(hideDentalCounsel);
                    $("select[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental3']").change(hideDentalCounsel);


                </script>
ReportSection.ReportItem:
21. LIFESTYLE ISSUES

Do you drink alcohol? {$item}
If yes, how much?{$item} # of drinks/week
Do you currently smoke or have you ever smoked? {$item}
Are you aware there are resources to support you? {$item}
how often / what type of activity? {$item}

ReportItem.options: COPD|Asthma|PND or Sleep Apnea|Cancer|Diabetes Mellitus|Hypertension|Hyperlipidemia|Atrial Fibrillation|Coronary Heart Disease|Stroke|Depression|Dementia|Arthritis|Other
